title: Fps Drops to 2-10
body: I didnt had this problem , but today i launched the game and it's impossible to play .  Game starts and in 5 min starts extreme fps drops to 2-10 , screen freezes and I cant do anythinig. And it heppens in every 1-2 min. I've chacked everythink but nothing helped.  If u know what the hell is going with my notebook or LOL client please help me . Thanks

replies.body:
You should try to disable DVR and nvidia share.
I have the same problem and if disable DVR and nvidia share don t solve it, you should try to use hextech repair tool just as me and reinstall / repair lol with it.
You should write a ticket to riot support, they are helping me how to solve it.

PS: i have a 960 gtx, 12g ram and i5 6500

Framerate issues can be caused by a handful of potential culprits, but typically we see these issues caused by driver or power settings issues. You may be able to resolve this by following the steps outlined in our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Please get back to me if you continue to experience FPS issues after taking those steps.

The same happens to me. Game starts out at 120 fps and over a time of about 10-15 minutes the frame rate drops to 1 fps. Killing the game and reconnecting to the session restarts the fps degradation process
I had this problem and i was using the rooster ward. I changed it and no longer using it and it is now fixed it.
